attributes.action: To restart investigations into UFOs and to open a new reporting channel.
attributes.additional_details: Because it's a serious topic and it shouldn't be overlooked like it has been in the past.
attributes.background: To study it more and release findings to the public as well as supporting the public and government officials with a reporting channel.
